review: This product is amazing and convenient and easy to install and easy to navigate and worth every penny. Makes every TV a smart tv as long as you have wifi. All your Netflix and Amazon info stays stored so you can take from TV to TV and not have to re login each time. We just took it on vacation and it was so nice to be able to play my kids shows or my own (after they went to bed) at a mountain house that has just basic cable. Love the firestick!
